item.title: @MINISTRY OF ENVIRONMENT - What is data science at the national level ?
item.description: Central french administration is a great opportunity to have a macro view of how to drive ideas to reality. Combine it with the experience of local administration, and you reinforce thinking to lead and design digital tools for answers. I design and produce data insight into public policy evaluation.

item.title: @SORBONNE- Le microcrédit encourage t'il l'éducation ?
item.description: Master's thesis written during my master's degree in applied economics at Sorbonne University.
